title: Manage Design Assumptions
description: During early design, an engineer has to make an assumption (e.g., about soil conditions) that must be documented and tracked for later verification.

tasks.description: Create a new entry in the project's design assumption log.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully initiates a new log entry.

tasks.description: Document the assumption, the reason for it, and what is required to verify it later (e.g., 'Geotechnical survey').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly documents the assumption and its verification plan.

tasks.description: Assign the assumption to a responsible engineer to track and ensure it is verified at the appropriate time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assigns the assumption to the lead civil engineer.
